answerText: Binx Bolling [or Binx Bolling][10] This Southern novelist wrote The Moviegoer. He also created Dr. Tom More in Love in the Ruins.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 18 | 19 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  This character has an affair with his secretary Sharon Kincaid. For 10 points each: [10] Name this New Orleans stockbroker who travels to Chicago with his step-cousin Kate Cutrer in The Moviegoer.
